info.brief_description: See little 14 year old Bobby get shrunken, eaten, transformed, laid or many other things
info.description:
Bobby is short, very short. At fourteen he is just 3'5 feet tall, the size of a second grader. Because of his size his classmates, teachers, friends and even his mom treat him like a child. All he wants is to be like everyone else, but Bobby isn't like everyone else and his life is going to be getting a lot crazier.

Anything goes in this one; there are no limits to what can happen to or around Bobby. If you want to have Bobby get swallowed alive, go for it. If you want to have him shrink and become someone’s sex toy, good luck. If you want to have him treated like a baby, get to it. Nothing is unacceptable in this interactive, so feel free to go wild.

Characters:
Bobby Burris – at the size of a second grader, he hates his size and often comes off grumpy and trying to overcompensate in maturity by trying to assert what he thinks are more grown-up interests, but fails. Has a self-worth issue due to many people treating him less for his size. He often finds himself inadvertently sucking his thumb when he becomes very nervous, which has gone on for a while unseen to most observers, although his mother knows.

Rose Burris (Mom) – 37 years old; At 5’11” with soft blue eyes and wavy light brown hair, she has a 38D chest and wide hips; a little bit thicker than the young girls but with kind eyes that still portray great energy. Bobby is her only child and loved taking care of him while he was a baby.


Good grammar and spelling is a must and try to add something more then a few sentences long. Otherwise enjoy the interactive either as a contributor or viewer. All feedback is accepted and encouraged. No trolls unless you’re planning to have one eat Bobby.

Have fun.
